Text:
Thank you from Canada!
This show romanticises the "ideal" american family and that disgusts me.  But then again the gay couple amuses me.  But then again america is still dealing with the gay rights issues in 2012.  I was disgusted that it took Alberta until 2005 to legalize gay marriage.  I'm sorry, I love the american people, but your government is fuuuuuuuuuuuuucked.

A little contradictive but sure thing Canada man. You're a gracious neihghbor, we enjoy and would never say anything bad about Canadians, we are so lucky that the Canadian army has our backs.

If the world was ever invaded by aliens from outer space I trust the intelligence and power of Canada to save the world.

Thank you, oh kind neighbor.
eztv, TOP. THank you very much :D
robidew shut the fuck up no one gives a shit what you think about anything you massive flying douche bag
robidew gay marriage isn't legal in Alberta either you uninformed moron
everyones a lil bit gay in may ^_^ Thanks eztv
frankrizzo u should be shot with a ball of your own shit !

Sorry about my drunken rant from the night before, I don't even remember doing it.  frankrizzo it is legal in Alberta:
 en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Same-sex_marriage_in_Alberta

If i'm missing something please let me know and have supporting evidence
Dear lord please let's not turn pirate bay comments into asinine "my country is better than yours" threads.
I'm a canuck and I blame his post on our great Canadian beer. It makes us say stupid shit all the time :)
